title.narrative: Improving preparedness and prevention to drought in pastoralist and agro pastoralist communities of northern Marsabit County

description.narrative: Overall Objective: Reducing the vulnerability to drought of population living in ASAL areas of KenyaSpecific objective: To strengthen drought preparedness mechanisms by promoting sustainable livelihoods in Northern Marsabit County.SOLIDARITES INTERNATIONAL (SI) will use a holistic approach to enhance existing local production, develop linkages to local markets and improve natural resources management. description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
